title: Complete Project Proposal
description: Prepare and submit the project proposal by the end of the week.

title: Review Code Changes
description: Review and provide feedback on the latest code changes in the development branch.

title: Prepare Presentation Slides
description: Create slides for the upcoming team presentation.

title: Schedule Meeting with Team
description: Coordinate a team meeting to discuss project progress.

title: Admin Task
description: Perform administrative tasks for system maintenance.

title: Simple Task
description: Complete a simple task assigned to the user.

title: Managerial Duty
description: Manage and oversee the team's daily activities.
